name: Himatanthus rigidus
reference: Syst. Veg., ed. 15 bis [Roemer & Schultes] 5: xiii, 221. 1819 [Dec 1819]
remarks: p. xiii: at the end of the genus description, Reliqu, Willd. MS. ex Herb. Com. ab Hoffmannsegge is cited. P. 221 shows H. rigida Com. ab Hoffmannsegge. Reliqu. Willd. MS. It is construed here that Willdenow coined the names Himatanthus & H. rigidus, and provided a single description for both names (see Melbourne Code Art. 46.3 Ex. 12). For the species, Schultes, the publishing author, provided a description (treated as superfluous).
